thread.title: Biden Won’t Be Pressured by Clinton Campaign
thread.title_full: Biden Won’t Be Pressured by Clinton Campaign

author: Taegan Goddard
title: Biden Won’t Be Pressured by Clinton Campaign
text:
Biden Won’t Be Pressured by Clinton Campaign October 19, 2015 By Taegan Goddard 0 Comments 
A close confidant and longtime adviser of Joe Biden’s who spoke to him recently tells CBS News that the vice president feels “he has earned the right to make a decision about his political future on his own timetable.” 
Said the source: “He does not like bullies and will not be bullied. He has never really been part of the Democratic establishment and could care less about it.” Related Posts Never miss a Political Wire post Your email address: * Please enter all required fields Correct invalid entries
